text: (nabiye! dænata æti obage bharyayavangen) pasu (oba vivaha kara gænimata venat) kisima kantavak obata anumata keneku nova. tavada ovunge alamkaraya obava akarsanaya kala vuvada, (obage) bharyayavangen kisivekut paha kara, e venuvata æyava gænimada, (obata anumata næta). obage dakunat himi kara gat kantavan hæra. (ovun obata anumata ayayi!) allah siyalla avadhanaya kara balanneku vasayen sitinneya
